summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 13th Ave. from East Fir Street to East Yesler Way; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 18799 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
